name: Chairem the Game
description:
A world where you can date sentient furniture. 

Based off of ProZD's Chairem  series.


Note: This is purely a fan game made just for fun

This is a work in progress and we are hoping to create more chapters.

Chapter 1 was made in 18 hours as part of the GDK Valenjam

Created by:

Alex Cortes - Programmer, Writer

Clarissa Diaz-Silva - Artist, Editor
